title: Smart Watch(Answer/Make Call), 1.85'' HD Smartwatch for Men Women, 2025 Fitness Tracker with 100+ Sport Modes, Heart/Sleep Monitor/Pedometer IP68 Waterproof Watch for Android iOS, Ocean Blue
description: Bluetooth Call and Message Alerts: Smart watch is equipped with HD speaker, after connecting to your smartphone via bluetooth, you can answer or make calls, view call history and store contacts through directly use the smartwatch. The smartwatches also provides notifications of social media messages (WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram usw.) (Note: smart watches cannot reply)
